show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: Spiritual Wisdom Regarding Work, Money, and Career

title: Spiritual Wisdom Regarding Work, Money, and Career
content: A talk with Marianne Williamson about her new book, The Law of Divine Compensation: On Work, Money, and Miracles; also... <!--more--> her Sister Giant project to get more women to run for political office and on a new kind of politics; poem by Kay Ryan
